portlets.description: View your current courses and class schedule, and see each course's library materials and online resources, location, time, and contacts.

portlets.title: New Hire NetID Activation
portlets.description: Enter basic NetID eligibility information for new employees who do not yet have an appointment/job in the HR system. This action generates a NetID Activation Key to be used by the new employee to activate his/her NetID.

portlets.title: Benefit Information
portlets.description: View current benefit selections, including dependent and plan information (i.e. medical, dental, and or vision benefits coverage).
